title: Missing org.infinispan.distribution.group.Group in infinispan-client extension
body:
### Describe the bug

An infinispan dependency that contains org.infinispan.distribution.group.Group is missing. 
Therefore it is not possible to configure group key according to  https://infinispan.org/docs/stable/titles/configuring/configuring.html#grouping-api_clustered-caches

### Expected behavior

org.infinispan.distribution.group.Group is part of infinispan-client extension

### Actual behavior

org.infinispan.distribution.group.Group is not a part of infinispan-client extension

### How to Reproduce?

Try to import `import org.infinispan.distribution.group.Group;` and set `@Group` annotation

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin MacBook15.local 22.5.0 Darwin Kernel Version 22.5.0

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.7"

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.16.7.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
